Let's craft final JSON.assistantfinal{
  "summary": "This module defines the core emitter infrastructure for Chainlit. It provides an abstract base emitter that outlines the contract for all emission actions and a concrete implementation that handles real‑time communication with the front‑end, managing session state, thread lifecycles, message processing, and broadcasting a wide variety of updates such as chat steps, token streams, audio data, function call results, UI elements, and task status changes.",
  "business_intent": "To supply a unified, high‑level API that drives interactive conversational experiences in Chainlit by reliably transmitting events and state changes from the backend to the user interface, enabling features like live chat, audio streaming, function invocation, and dynamic UI updates.",
  "keywords": [
    "emitter",
    "real‑time communication",
    "chat interface",
    "session management",
    "thread lifecycle",
    "message handling",
    "audio streaming",
    "function call integration",
    "UI element delivery",
    "task tracking",
    "token streaming",
    "event broadcasting"
  ]
}
